name: Mission Education Center
description: School Type: Elementary School Serves grades: PreK, TK, K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch Mission Education Center is a PreK-5 elementary school for newly arrived Spanish-speaking immigrant students. This transitional program helps the newcomer students achieve the necessary skills and confidence to succeed in regular schools to which they will transfer at the end of one year. Their teachers are Spanish bilingual and credentialed to work with our newcomer population. The main focus
